attributes.action: Remove Nicholas Butt's right to access the internet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the undersigned, the people from a reject area of Facebook, propose that Nicholas Butt has his computer taken away & also his right to internet connection. 

Also, please step out of Iraq; you're making the UK look stupid.

Thanks.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
